name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton 3/4 Raglan T-Shirt, Style G5700, 2-Pack
reviews: The colour bled a tiny bit but that was a bit my fault, I didn’t switch to the dryer fast enough. On the second wash the bleeding faded off the white part of the shirt and didn’t bleed again.  They shrunk a bit, but ended up fitting perfectly because of the shrinkage.  Really great shirts for the price.

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton 3/4 Raglan T-Shirt, Style G5700, 2-Pack
reviews: Bought for spouse for his birthday. It fits good XL however the arms are a bit short. A true 3/4 length is about an inch or so longer. They are more half length as they stop at elbows.

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton 3/4 Raglan T-Shirt, Style G5700, 2-Pack
reviews: The Gildan brand always offers value on par with basic Hanes or Fruit of the Loom goods.Nothing fancy, but great as a light cotton base under warmups, a track suit or hoody sweat shirt.If you intend to wear this 3/4 sleeve as a top layer, do order up one size unless you prefer a close fitting look. Other brands offer just a single shirt for this pairs price (however often as a slightly weightier & roomier cotton/poly blend)
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 December 2023

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton 3/4 Raglan T-Shirt, Style G5700, 2-Pack
reviews: I love these shirts. Of course, this style is available from other manufacturers, but I haven't found any at the same quality or price point. I'm not a shill for Gildan, but all the clothing I have bought from them has been both affordable and good quality.

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton 3/4 Raglan T-Shirt, Style G5700, 2-Pack
reviews: The fabric is a very nice quality for the money.  The cut is good and the shirt fits exactly as expected.  What I did not expect was to have to do alterations on my fresh out of the package clothing due to poor sewing and a lack of quality check before they were packaged.  I like my seams to go inside my clothing, and all the way to the end of the sleeve thanks!

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton 3/4 Raglan T-Shirt, Style G5700, 2-Pack
reviews: runs a little small. 6’ tall, ordered a large, which is my normal short size. these fit fine other then being a little bit short. length was good before washing though.i’d suggest ordering a size up.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 December 2022

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton 3/4 Raglan T-Shirt, Style G5700, 2-Pack
reviews: Decent quality. I like that it is a 2-pack and price point is very reasonable. I was skeptical with the sizing though. Being 100% cotton, I bought one size up. I like a medium fit, but I purchased size large. I put only one t-shirt in a regular wash and hot dry cycle. I have white/black. The black does bleed a little into the water, but stayed a true black after washing. The white section did not turn grey.  4 stars because they do shrink. The large turns into a medium size. As per my pictures, you can see the entire t-shirt shrunk 1 inch everywhere, body, sleeves.  I will be adding lettering so I needed to make sure sizing was washed out and that it would not shrink any further. I suppose the t-shirts may not shrink at all if they were washed in cold/warm water and hung to dry, skipping the hot dryer. I hope this helps anyone who is questioning sizing. My order was shipped without much delay, one week I believe, so I recommend the Seller and their product in my review.

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton 3/4 Raglan T-Shirt, Style G5700, 2-Pack
reviews: I'd suggest buying one size bigger than you need.But the shirts are well made and don't distort after a couple of washes and drying cycles.It's a good product IMHO.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2024
